reviewText:
HOORAY! SOMEONE AT PARAMOUNT MUST BE READING THESE CUSTOMER REVIEWS!!!

Gunsmoke, Season 5, Vol. 2 is scheduled to be released on December 13, 2011 - Just 2 months after the October 11, 2011 release date for Season 5, Vol. 1 - and JUST IN TIME FOR CHRISTMAS!!!

Thank you, Paramount.

Remember Paramount was the studio that cancelled the original Star Trek TV series and was swamped with so many viewer complaints that they brought the series BACK.

These reviews ARE worth the effort.  Keep up the pressure.  Let the studios know what you want for your hard-earned cash.  And place your "Pre-Orders" early - I've already placed mine.  Nothing encourages studios to issue more releases like customers putting their money where their mouths are.

NOW IF WE CAN JUST GET PARAMOUNT TO INCLUDE SOME EXTRAS WITH FUTURE RELEASES...

--- (My 5-Star rating is based on the picture and sound quality of previous seasons.) ---

This filled out my collection of seasons 1 through 10. Which I am watching as I speak. The greatest western series of all time. And no blasted commercials. Hit play all, and you can sit back and watch one episode after the next without budging. Although for some mysterious reason this was the only one of the volumes not with Prime shipping, it still came very quick. And brand spanking new. I am very pleased with this overall, and would definitely recommend this volume without hesitation.
love it
Excellent product!

I love this show. I don't know who is selling this half of the fifth season but the price is ridicules. Its robbery to charge so much for only half a season. This is a review of the price, not the show.
great as ever. I am now looking for seasons 13 through 20.
Gunsmoke is an all-time favorite... love, love, love the first 6 seasons!
Very enjoyable series.
Always enjoy Gunsmoke

This was the number one TV show for this season.  The characters had settled into their roles, the half hour show was perfect for the writers making for great entertainment.  This season, the show expanded beyond the standard western story line. Looking at emotions and failings as much as standard western fair.
Johnny Red, Crowbait Bob and Jailbait Janet are two excellent examples of this expansion.  Both are somewhat comic and at the same time very realistic and human.  This is not to say the season lacks westerns, Horse Deal and Kangaroo is one of the better stories.
The season is split into two purchases and you will want to make both purchases at once.
Outstanding
Episodes good as usual.
very good

Gunsmoke provides western-lovers with a family-friendly great show that emphasizes character, law & order, and good plain common sense. This half-season, as well as all previous episodes, provide a breath of fresh air in an age when many of the most entertaining movies have drifted from such character-building values. It is amazing to me that the writers were successful in making the plot and storyline consistently excellent and among the best of the classic Westerns from season to season for so many consecutive seasons. I cannot think of one episode to date that felt weak or that let me down.

Definitely a great addition for the video library of anyone who likes the Western genre, or who likes solid character and good role models in the primary characters, and a strengthening of the ideas of justice, fair play, the rule of law, and even compassion and wisdom throughout.
great
Dad's favorite show.  I buy him a new season every time I purchase him a gift.
Great series! Seems ageless. Western genre at its best, esp the first 10 seasons.
Good quality product.
Love westerns...always enjoy watching GunSmoke...
anudda grayt seezon!
IT IZ GOOD !!!!!!
no comment needed with rating

Excellent series. I bought this because Barry Atwater is in this. For those who wish to know what is on these discs, I am leaving the disc information...Disc 1; Hinka Do, Doc Judge, Moo Moo Raid, Kitty's Killing, Jailbait Janet, Unwanted Deputy, Where'd They Go - Disc2; Crowbait Bob, Colleen so Green, The Exurbanites, I thee Wed, The Lady killer, Gentlemen's Disagreement - Disc 3; Speak Me Fair, Belle's Back, The Bobsy Twins, Old Flame, The Deserter, Cherry Red
More of the one half hour shows that are not to be missed.
great action. great actors
Gave as a gift and the person loved it.
Bought for housebound mom,  Good , clean show
great
wife can:t get enough of gunsmoke.
What episodes does S02 vol. 2 cover?
EXCELLENT

I still say the half-hour episodes were the best and still hold-up well today..  Fantastic directors.... Andrew McLaghlen (actor Victor's son) Arthur Hiller, Ted Post.....Better written, darker, grittier, funnier and you spent more time with Kitty, Doc, Chester and Matt instead of throwing them into only about 15 minutes of the show for the sake of the guest-stars as was often the case with the hour-long 'Gunsmoke'. Truly the BEST of the 'Golden-Age of Television'.
Gunsmoke is a staple in our home! Could watch these over and over!
quite good.
Brings back the memories.  Excellent quality
I have bought so many of these seasons for my husband, it's easy to lose track of which seasons he has. We never get tired of watching Gunsmoke!

Love gunsmoke reason a 4 instead of 5 star  ( only one reason ). There real slow in developing other seasons  and when they come out they can be a little pricy // this is a DVD /  ( blue ray is out and 4 k coming soon ) and we're still waiting. On reg DVDs  on more seasons
Love Gunsmoke
My dad loves it

Five stars for season five. Season Five has some of the best episodes in this classic series.  The characters are well established but not yet stale.  The video quality is absolutely excellent - far better than watching it on TVland or youtube.
love gunsmoke my favorate
the best
as promised
My boss just loves Gunsmoke. I get these for him for Christmas every yr for I am not sure how many yrs now. Hopefully he will have them all one of these yrs.
Thanks
Great!!
Just what I wanted, fast shipping, highly recommend.
Fast Shipment Product as Advertised
Item as described fast free shipping lovem
This is classic Gunsmoke at its best.  I bought this for my 91 year old Dad and he has enjoyed this like no other series.

In my opinion Gunsmoke is one of the all-time classic western shows. The shows are well written so the whole family can enjoy them. Sadly this is not the cast with some TV show on television today. DVD reviews are hard to write because is it all personal preference. If you like the show you will enjoy it
AAA+++
I am a HUGE fan of the series Gunsmoke and was thrilled to finally be able to purchase these DVDs at a great price. I am looking forward to the release of season 10 this August!
The video was cool, but the case was broken inside.  I was always a fan of Gunsmoke so this just fulfills my Gunsmoke junky needs.
We love these series.  We watch it every weekend, and truly enjoy every episode so far.  I wish today's movies were made like these.
We enjoy watching old episodes of Gunsmoke and the DVDs are the perfect means.  DVDs were new in original packaging and all is good.
Gunsmoke will never be old to me. I love every episode, I just wish they could put more Gunsmoke Seasons out more frequently.
i had bought this season for my father for his birthday and he love them. they were a great price and as always the shipping was free so so happy with this buy..
Pretty soon I'll have the complete collection, brings back great memories of my childhood,  when we would listen to Gunsmoke on the radio.
Container was broken when arrived and reported it but did not get any response. I replaced the container myself but have not played the DVD's yet and hope they are not scratched and don't play.
Volumes can be written about this TV series.  This was the first true adult western on TV.  It boasted a great cast and a myrid of great guest stars.  This completes the 39 episodes for season five.
This item arrived on time and in excellent condition. I would recommend the purchase of this movie to anyone that like good old Westerns.
I can remember watching Gunsmoke when I was 10 years old and thought it was boring; but have rediscovered how really good it was and how much I like "Matt, Kitty, Doc and Chester".

I BELIEVE THAT WHEN JAMES ARNESS TOOK OVER PRODUCTION OF GUNSMOKE, THE STORYLINE WAS GREATLY IMPROVED. FOR EXAMPLE, ONE EPISODE WAS  HIGH COMEDY WHEN MATT DILLON AND CHESTER ARE CONNED INTO SPENDING A DAY REPAIRING THE HOUSE AND FENCE OF A HOMESTEADER.
ANOHTER HAD AN UNUSUAL TWIST: A BEAUTIFUL WOMAN ARRIVES IN TOWN AND THERE IS CONCERN THAT AN UNUSUITABLE MAN IS PAYING HER ATTENTION. DESPITE THE FACT THAT THIS LADY IS WARNED SHE MARRIES THE MAN WHO IS CONSIDERED TO BE NO MORE THAN A CROOK. HE BUYS HER A HOUSE. SHE PROCEEDS TO GET HIM DRUNK AND SELLS THE HOUSE, TAKES 3,000 OF HIS MONEY AND DISAPPEARS. SO, THE LADY IS A CROOK AND THE CROOK HAS REFORMED..
I bought this for my brother and he has enjoyed it very much. I will be buying other seasons for him.

Stories about people who think they are above common sense, and how the gun and whiskey ruled the lives of many dishonest people.  Death ruled when a mans honor was called, unlike today when there is no honor in a lot of men.

Not all the smut you find in movies and shows we have now adays.

I'm really enjoying the early seasons of this classic series.  I actually prefer the half-hour, black and white episodes.  The set was in great shape and the price was better than I could have gotten it at the used book store.
Great show! We loved this series and simply can not get enough of it. Good old drama and clean fun makes this a great show.
It is Gunsmoke, what's not to love! It's not like there is anything decent to watch on television anymore. Netflix quit carrying Gunsmoke so what are you left with?

When I was younger when these programs were on Television I was working, now that
I am retired and can now enjoy a lot of programs filmed back then is really wonderful.  I
just can't get enough of all the old westerns but Gunsmoke top the list of my favorites.
Only the presence of James Arness, Ken Curtis, Milburn Stone and Amanda Blake, lead to genuine credibility which until then was the most enduring TV series.
Again great action episodes with marshall Matt and Chester bringing down the bad guys and enjoying all of the coffee along the way.
Looking forward to getting more seasons in the future. Great show and a must see in my eyes. Thank you
Happy to have  this.and looking forward to getting all of them for our collection. Happy with the price too.  Enjoyed the series.

As a fan of Gunsmoke i always enjoy watching Matt Dillon,Matt Dillon IS Gunsmoke! good quality dvd,always well packaged,the only way for Gunsmoke to be delivered. Gunsmoke fans will not be disappointed,discs come in as good a condition as the show itself.

Gunsmoke: The Fifth Season, Vol. 2

Go glad I purchased this video for my Western video collection. Always looking for more.
Since I'm a huge fan of Gunsmoke this was a must for my library. I recomend this product to anyone who enjoys the old westerns.
I always was western fan , and grew up with gunsmoke, it started airing when i was 2 years old been watching it ever scents
Now have up to 5 seasons of this great western TV show. It is by far my husband's favorite show in his collection.

The fifth season, volume2,  is simply wonderful,as all the half hour gunsmoke shows are. I prefer the earlier shows. I believe I prefer them, because they are stories about Matt Dillon, and of course Chester, Doc, and Miss Kitty. There is something about these characters that makes us believe in true friendship. I love Gunsmoke. There will never be another TV show, that will come close to it. I saw where they are making a movie about the Lone Ranger, and cannot believe they would choose that show over Gunsmoke!!!

Arrived early and in great condition.  Would be happy to buy again from this seller.  The seller can't controll this, but it would be nice if CBS would not split the seasons.  I have noticed this comment in other reviews.

Gunsmoke Season 6 Vol 1
There are great stories in these episodes.  They had some very good writers working on this.  I'm anxious for the hour long episodes to be released.

Hadn't known about these early, 30 minute episodes until they showed up on The Western Channel. Have really enjoyed the short stories - you can tell they started out as radio scripts but I like that aspect of them.

I have enjoyed the fifth season of Gunsmoke. Although the first 5 seasons are in black and white the picture is of great quality as are the stories. I have not seen these older episodes on reruns as I have the later years that were in color. Dennis Weaver is great as Chester and it is good to see Doc, Miss Kitty and Matt in their younger years.
Dave

Family friendly show with only a few episodes that include a mature topic.  Always presented in a way that brings a great discussion with my kids.  Right doesn't always win, but again, another good discussion topic with my kids!  Much better than what many modern shows offer.  Also, brings in some historical issues - again, great for discussion.

HUGE fan of Gunsmoke and im hoping for the other seasons to come out. I do believe that it could b more swift. Clearly put when you have certain parts of a program you ask- How soon til you receive the whole thing?

Hey, what can you say, it's Gunsmoke, it's GREAT!  I hope they hurry up and come out with the next 5 seasons. (Having grown up watching B/W TV, I prefer the seasons in B/W. I think the stories were better too.)

My husband love's Gunsmoke with all of the repeat characters whom he has watched aged with each season!  These vidoes help him get though the non-football season.  Can't wait for the next release!!!  He even watched Gunsmoke each day on cable, along with the videos - He is a real Gunsmoke junkie.

As 2011 comes to a close, it's nice that Paramount has released 5 complete seasons of Gunsmoke. I have bought them all, Paramount...so keep 'em comin'!  Thanks for the continuing 5 star quality on this series too! A happy customer...

What's there not to like. You get 20 episodes in pristine condition, classic Good against Evil. This covers late 1959-early 1960. Great production. What I especially like is that they are only 25 minutes long each, which makes it a good time killer while waiting for the news, or dinner. Extra bonus, Some of th4e old commericials that aired in 1959-60 brings back many memories. Essential for any fan!

This episode, as well as all previous episodes, provide a breath of fresh air in an age when many of the most entertaining movies have drifted from such character-building values. It is amazing to me that the writers were successful in making the plot and storyline consistently excellent and among the best of the classic Westerns from season to season for so many consecutive years.

Definitely a great addition for the video library of anyone who likes the Western genre, or who likes solid character and good role models in the primary characters, and a strengthening of the ideas of justice, fair play, the rule of law, and even compassion and wisdom throughout.
Nice
a
Very fast an new product love it
In season 5 three episodes did not work
Great show
Great family entertainment.

The first six seasons are the best. In black and white and only a half hour, they give more of a sense of it's place in history. The stories quickly develop and usually the story ends with Matt shooting or beating up the bad guy.
Exactly what I was looking for. Love all Gunsmoke. Filling out my collection

Good quality DVD.  The show is fabulous as well.  The characters make you feel like you want to be there with them. They are all good people who care about each other and love the simple life they have together.
